Method Detail

createUserBean

public MUserBean createUserBean()
Create a new user bean. The ID is a progressive number based on the value NUMBER_OF_ELEMENTS defined in StressTestValues

Returns:
the newly created user bean, or null if the maximum NUMBER_OF_ELEMENTS is reached
